entry.title: 0.7.1 release candidate 1 ready for testing
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen, a prominent figure in the Bitcoin community, posted a question on October 11th, 2012 regarding the progress made towards a release candidate QA sanity testing plan. Meanwhile, Jeff Garzik responded to this query by sharing a forum thread where he had previously called for testing. This forum thread was available on bitcointalk.org under the topic of 117487. Jeff Garzik is the Founder and CEO of exMULTI, a company that focuses on blockchain-related projects.
